description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow 3 x first floor existing PVC windows to be replaced with white powder coated aluminium framed windows. in relation to planning permission reference 241983VAR dated 29/08/2024 for: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), seeking to allow alterations to the cycle store' in pursuant to planning permission reference 232225FUL dated 08/11/2023 for'' Construction of first floor rear/side extensions and second and third floor levels to accommodate a Hotel, 9 rooms, (Use Class C1) including associated refuse and cycle storage provision and alteration to shopfront.''
site_name: 13 Station Parade Uxbridge RoadEalingW5 3LD
